abstract: As sales of home improvement items fall and consumer confidence weakens, retailers are starting to feel the effects of the housing slump.
snippet: As sales of home improvement items fall and consumer confidence weakens, retailers are starting to feel the effects of the housing slump.
lead_paragraph: Retailers are starting to feel the effects of the housing slump, with two big-name merchants announcing yesterday that they were cutting back their forecasts for profit over the next few months as sales of home improvement items fall and consumer confidence weakens.

headline.main: Citing Weak Housing Market, Home Depot and Sears Lower Estimates
headline.print_headline: Citing Weak Housing Market, Home Depot and Sears Lower Estimates
